Name: Terror World
About the game: “ Terror World “ is a survival adventure game. The characteristics of the game 'Terror World' are: 【Drive the Train】You can drive the train to explore the world. You need to find fuel to replenish the train's energy. You can also bring supplies to the train for emergency needs. 【Cold】 The cold will gradually approach you as you are outside the train. It will reduce your temperature and gradually threaten your life. 【A lot of enemies】 You have to watch out for enemies who threaten your life at any time while you resist the cold. 【Town】is a town that was left behind before. There may be all kinds of materials you need. [More exploration content] Key Operation Q Capture Objects G drop the object. E Off/On
